mapper.select: SELECT A.BABY_NO "baby_no", A.BABY_NAME "baby_name", A.BABY_REGNO1 "baby_regno1", A.BABY_REGNO2 "baby_regno2", A.BABY_BLOOD "baby_blood", A.BABY_GENDER "baby_gender", A.BABY_VISIT "baby_visit", B.PARENT_NAME "parent_name", B.PARENT_TEL "parent_tel", B.PARENT_ADDR "parent_addr", B.PARENT_ADDRDETAIL "parent_addrdetail" FROM BABY A, PARENT B WHERE A.PARENT_NO = B.PARENT_NO AND BABY_NO = 1
